text: Ra jasala'i yi musrikaharu allaha baheka guharchan tiniharula'i gali nagarnu kina bhane tyaso garema yiniharu ajnanatama allahala'i naramro bhanne chan. Yasa prakara hamile hareka samuhaka kriyakalapaharula'i akarsaka bana'era dekha'eka chaum. Pachi tiniharule aphno palanakartache'u pharkera janu cha. Ani usale tiniharula'i bata'une cha je tiniharule garne gardathe
